content: I see what you mean about the resale value. So, if I were to subdivide the ancestral land, I'd need to consider the potential impact on the property's value and tax implications. I'll definitely look into that further. By the way, speaking of the ancestral land, I was thinking of using some of the money from the potential sale of a portion of the land to invest in a community-supported agriculture (CSA) program. Have you heard of those?
